name: Brother (chancetnt)
description:
The setting of The Game would take place in the forest. The two brothers move out of the city because they couldn't handle all the stress and noise and they wanted to move somewhere more beautiful than any other place.  As the brothers live in the forest they have built their own house have gone hunting for their own food and have created tools to help them survive and do other things. One day one of the brothers went out and never came back until the other brother decides to go out looking for his brother and finds out that he's been taken by wolves. 

also want to say thanks to Cecilia for letting me use his house. also, moshuo for the trees and bushes.

 https://www.kindpng.com/userpngs/17099/
